isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Flywheel and Flywheel Housing - Installation

svcproc.title: Flywheel Housing and Rear Engine Mounting Brackets

step1.para: Install a new flywheel housing seal in the crankcase side of the flywheel housing.

note.para: Verify two hollow dowels are installed in the crankcase side of the flywheel housing before installing the housing.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, get assistance to remove or install the flywheel housing.

calloutgroup.callout1: M12 x 40 rear engine mount bolt (8)

step1.para: With help from an assistant, lift the flywheel housing into position and align two hollow dowels of the flywheel housing with dowel holes in the crankcase and install one M12 x 50 flywheel housing bolt finger tight.
Install seven remaining M12 x 50 flywheel housing bolts finger tight.
Tighten eight M12 x 50 flywheel housing bolts to standard torque .

note.para: On engines with a 148-tooth ring gear, leave the lowest, rear most M12 x 40 mounting bracket bolt loose (2 or 3 threads) on each side of the flywheel housing (SAE #1A). This will provide clearance for installation of the flywheel and ring gear assembly.

step1.para: Install two rear engine mounting brackets and finger tighten eight M12 x 40 bolts.
Tighten eight M12 x 40 bracket bolts to standard torque.
